zh: 我扫了眼大街，在穿梭的人群中，有个人正低头看着我。

en: I snapped the thread on my canine.
zh: 我用虎牙把线咬断了。

en: I swung my leg over the fence.
zh: 我一抬腿跨过了栅栏。

en: If you sum up feminist counselling in a few words, I suppose it would be counselling done from a woman's standpoint.
zh: 要是简单概括一下女性主义咨询，我觉得就是从女性立场出发的咨询。

en: I will not say play fair but I would wish that you refrain from indiscreet acts.
zh: 我不说让你非得公平竞争，但希望你别搞那些小动作。

en: I imagined my first kiss would be more romantic.
zh: 我原以为我的初吻会更浪漫一点。

en: It is essential that some kind of compromise be reached between Pyongyang and Washington.
zh: 平壤和华盛顿之间必须得达成某种妥协。

en: I think Hitler will have an unpleasant afterlife.
zh: 我觉得希特勒死后肯定没好日子过。

en: How could you? Is our relationship really so cold?
zh: 你怎么能这样？咱们的关系难道就这么冷淡吗？

en: What a surprise! The onsen lodge had turned into a fish breeding farm.
zh: 太意外了！那家温泉旅馆竟然变成养鱼场了。

en: Possibly because he's got a beard, he looks scary at first glance but he's really a kind man.
zh: 可能是因为留了胡子，他乍一看挺凶的，其实心肠特别好。

en: The hit-and-run driver, accompanied by his father, came and turned himself in the next day.
zh: 那个肇事逃逸的司机第二天在他父亲的陪同下，过来投案自首了。

en: Beer is taxed according to its malt content, so low-malt beer is cheaper.
zh: 啤酒是按麦芽含量收税的，所以低麦芽啤酒更便宜。

en: Beavers rarely inflict damage on people.
zh: 海狸很少会伤人。

en: Humpty Dumpty sat on a wall. Humpty Dumpty had a great fall. All the king's horses and all the king's men couldn't put Humpty Dumpty together again.
zh: 矮胖子坐墙头，栽了个大跟头。国王所有的马和所有的兵，都没法把他再拼回原样。

en: Pandas live in bamboo thickets.
zh: 大熊猫生活在竹林里。

en: The bread was baked light and fluffy.
zh: 面包烤得蓬松又柔软。

en: Hawai, y'know, has a lot of houses with fireplaces doesn't it? The mornings and evenings over there get cold as well so people who feel the cold light fires.
zh: 夏威夷有很多带壁炉的房子，对吧？那边早晚也冷，所以怕冷的人会生火取暖。

en: There were so few proper members in the badminton club that it was half-way between dead and 'on break'.
zh: 羽毛球社都没几个正经社员了，基本处于半废止状态。

en: Please hold your bat by the end of its handle.
zh: 请握住球棒手柄的末端。

en: Yes. This one I can sing from memory.
zh: 对。这首我能背着唱出来。

en: Here, bro, halfsies.
zh: 给，兄弟，咱俩一人一半。

en: I concocted an excuse for missing the party.
zh: 我编了个借口没去参加派对。

en: He suggested I go with him to the party.
zh: 他建议我和他一起去参加派对。

en: Ahh ... well I was young but what a stupid mistake.
zh: 唉……虽然那时候还年轻，但这错犯得也太傻了。

en: Huh? Don't be so whiny! And you call yourself a man!
zh: 哈？别这么磨叽！你还算个男人吗！

en: Nordic combined is one of the winter sport events, a competition where you compete on the combination of two Nordic style ski events - cross country skiing and ski jumping.
zh: 北欧两项是冬季运动项目之一，是结合了越野滑雪和跳台滑雪的综合性比赛。

en: I got really into it, and I just can't forget the exhilaration of becoming one with the audience.
zh: 我彻底投入进去了，忘不了那种和观众融为一体的兴奋感。

en: There are people who go mad for the nostalgic feel and also those who love originality.
zh: 既有对这种怀旧感着迷的人，也有追求原创性的人。

en: Get out the way ... they'll escape!
zh: 快让开……别让他们跑了！

en: No spoilers, please!
zh: 请勿剧透！

en: Look! That shop's just opened! Why not take a look?
zh: 快看！那家店刚开业！咱们进去逛逛？

en: New York City has long been unusual because of its sheer size.
zh: 纽约一直以来就因为它的庞大规模而显得很特别。

en: You'll have to ask at the newsstand.
zh: 你得去报刊亭打听一下。

en: You can buy it at newsstands.
zh: 在报刊亭就能买到。

en: Somehow you must find a way to finish this work in one month.
zh: 你无论如何也得想办法在一个月内把活儿干完。

en: I wonder why he was suddenly dropped from the team half way through.
zh: 真搞不懂他怎么半路突然被踢出队了。

en: Why don't you leg it?
zh: 你干嘛不赶紧跑啊？

en: I don't quite follow, but it looks like it will prove tricky. Ergh.
zh: 我没太听懂，但感觉事情会变得很棘手。呃。

en: You've run into some trouble or something?
zh: 你是遇到什么麻烦了吗？

en: I had a nagging feeling that the atmosphere resembled somebody and, now that you mention it, yes, you're right. Certainly ZZ TOP had this kind of feel.
zh: 我总觉得这氛围有点像谁，听你这么一说还真是，ZZ TOP 确实有这种感觉。

en: I had tried to avoid thinking that as much as possible but as soon as I faced it I started to feel miserable.
zh: 我一直尽量不去想那件事，可一旦真的面对，就开始觉得心里特难受。

en: This is not to say that Mr. Tanaka did it all on his own.
zh: 倒也不是说这全是田中先生一个人干的。

en: I wonder why it is that some plants become annuals and others perennials?
zh: 我就在想，为什么有些植物是一年生的，有些却是多年生的呢？

en: For some reason it didn't go well, shot down at every attempt, and he led a sad "History of no girlfriend = Age" life.
zh: 不知道为什么，他做什么都不顺，处处碰壁，一直过着“母胎单身”的悲惨生活。

en: For some reason economic booms have names taken from Japanese mythology given to them.
zh: 不知道为什么，经济景气时期总是用日本神话里的名字来命名。

en: Did I say something funny? Did I make a joke?
zh: 我说错什么了吗？我是在讲冷笑话吗？

en: Whatever the reason, forfeiting the trade that we finally got on track is a fiasco.
zh: 不管什么原因，把好不容易走上正轨的生意搞丢了，真是彻底搞砸了。

en: Whatever you need to talk about, if I will do, I'll answer with loving care.
zh: 无论你想聊什么，只要是我能做的，我都会满怀爱心地回答你。

en: Please simmer the beans for a while over a low heat.
zh: 请用小火把豆子炖一会儿。

en: Thanks, I hear you've been taking care of my little brat of a brother.
zh: 谢谢啊，听说你一直挺照顾我那个调皮捣蛋的弟弟。

en: Tom went splashing through the shallows.
zh: 汤姆趟着浅水哗啦哗啦地走着。

en: Anyhow, lunch ... is where I wanted to go but I decided to go to the toilet first.
zh: 反正，午饭……我本来想去吃的，但后来决定先去趟厕所。

en: It's a very good company! The president is a real go-getter and the workers all put in their best.
zh: 那是个非常棒的公司！老板特别有干劲，员工们也都很卖力。

en: No, no! That's not right.
zh: 不对，不对！不是那样的。

en: It isn't clear which of them wanted that.
zh: 还不清楚他们当中到底是谁想要那个。

en: Got cancelled at the last minute. 'Deferred to next week'.
zh: 最后一刻被取消了，“推迟到下周”。

en: Roll up your sleeves and get to work.
zh: 卷起袖子干活吧。

en: By the way, I wonder how much of a hand Hiragawa MP plays in this matter?
zh: 顺便问一下，我挺好奇平川议员在这件事里到底参与了多少？

en: No matter how you look at it you're a beautiful, ill-fated woman, the heroine of a tragedy.
zh: 不管怎么看，你都是个红颜薄命的美女，活脱脱一个悲剧女主角。

en: What happened to this place?! It's completely dead!
zh: 这地方怎么了？！一点生气都没有，冷清得要命！

en: So? Feeling refreshed, the morning after graduating from virginity?
zh: 怎么样？告别处男之身的第二天早上，感觉清爽吗？

en: It looks like I must have dozed off.
zh: 看来我刚才应该是打了个盹。

en: It looks like I must've dozed off.
zh: 我好像睡着了。

en: It seems like that she wasn't acting back then; they were her real feelings.
zh: 看来她当时不是在演戏，那些都是她的真情实感。

en: It looks like we've been able to fill in that one year gap and renew our old friendship.
zh: 看来我们已经弥补了一年的空白，重拾了旧日的友谊。

en: I was expecting it to be a bad book, but damn me if it wasn't quite good after all.
zh: 我本以为那是本烂书，没成想读完居然还挺不错的。

en: If I'm going to have a wedding ceremony, I want it to be the best ever so I have no regrets!
zh: 要是办婚礼的话，我想办成最好的，不留任何遗憾！

en: I'm sure Taeko was scared and tried to get Yuri to go along with her.
zh: 我敢肯定妙子当时吓坏了，所以才想拉着由里跟她一起。

en: No doubt, regardless of the time, she was planning to go to the net café without me if I hadn't arrived first.
zh: 毫无疑问，要是我没先到，不管什么时候她都打算撇下我自己去网吧。

en: I don't know what, but I felt in my heart something that gives me the chills.
zh: 我也说不上来，但心里总有一种让人发毛的感觉。

en: What sort of current affairs appear in the civil service examination?
zh: 公务员考试都会考哪些时政内容？

en: Television turned on, she patrols in front of the CRT. "Hey you, food's up!"
zh: 电视开着，她在屏幕前走来走去。“喂，开饭了！”

en: Theremin: The world's first electronic musical instrument, made by Russian physicist Lev Sergeivitch Termen in 1920.
zh: 泰雷明：世界上第一种电子乐器，由俄国物理学家莱夫·谢尔盖耶维奇·泰雷明在1920年发明。
tokens: 莱夫·谢尔盖耶维奇·泰雷明

en: But on the day of the mock exams, there are no club activities, so that means I can walk back home with Haruka. And I'm grateful for that.
zh: 不过模拟考那天没有社团活动，这样我就能和遥一起走回家了。对此我真的很感激。

en: There's no but about it!
zh: 没什么好“但是”的！

en: However, Vince, on Jen's house's veranda, was naked from the waist up. He might even have been starkers!
zh: 不过，文斯在阿珍家的阳台上光着膀子，甚至可能全裸着！

en: Let's have a party with members of the tennis club.
zh: 咱们和网球部的成员一起搞个派对吧。

en: The design was also given the finishing touch to have launch impact and dynamism provided by the novelty of the arch shaped logo design.
zh: 设计中新颖的拱形标志起到了画龙点睛的作用，让整体更有冲击力和动感。

en: If at all possible, you should go and look into the matter yourself.
zh: 如果可以的话，你最好亲自去调查一下这件事。

en: I tried to make it as cheap as possible.
zh: 我尽量把它做得便宜点。

en: If you can, get a sketchbook and a 4B pencil. You don't need such expensive art materials yet.
zh: 可以的话，买个速写本和一支4B铅笔。你现在还不需要那么贵的画具。

en: I also digitized it and made a desktop image.
zh: 我把它数字化了，还做成了一张桌面壁纸。

en: Done! Now I just have to set it to simmer so it doesn't boil before everybody comes.
zh: 搞定！现在只要小火炖着就行了，免得大家还没来就煮干了。

en: Dickens' thoughts come across along with the vivid depiction of old London.
zh: 狄更斯的思想随着对老伦敦的生动描写跃然纸上。

en: And so it seems she tried phoning but it's who was on the other end of that phone that was the problem.
zh: 看来她是试着打电话了，但问题在于电话那头的人是谁。

en: That is, total exhaustion. Body and soul completely knackered.
zh: 也就是说，彻底累垮了。身心俱疲，整个人都虚脱了。

en: In other words, he's saying to use the flower vase in place of the urine bottle?
zh: 换句话说，他是想用花瓶代替尿壶？

en: Thoughts of being trapped grew stronger.
zh: 那种被困住的感觉越来越强烈了。

en: Or rather, is it not just pathetic that I think such whiny thoughts like this?
zh: 或者说，我有这种怨天尤人的想法，是不是太没出息了？

en: Or rather it seems, Kensuke arrived at the studio at the same that I and the other two were still coming.
zh: 或者说，健介到达工作室的时候，我和另外两个人才刚赶到。

en: Sheesh, that Keiko - she's cute or she's hateful, just can't make her out.
zh: 哎呀，那个景子——又是可爱又是可恨的，真让人捉摸不透。

en: Only the other day in a railway accident, without the time to send out a mayday, many people lost their lives.
zh: 就在前几天的铁路事故中，好多人还没来得及发出求救信号就丧命了。

en: I've finally got the whole set!
zh: 我终于凑齐一整套了！

en: The communist got his dependable supporter at last.
zh: 那个共产主义者终于得到了他可靠的支持者。

en: If you just crouch a little, her crotch can just be seen flicking in and out of sight.
zh: 你要是稍微蹲下点，就能看到她下面若隐若现的。

en: Let's step out for a short walk.
zh: 咱们出去散散步吧。

en: Come round the corner for coffee.
zh: 拐过弯来喝杯咖啡吧。

en: Hey! What are you doing blocking the way?
zh: 嘿！你挡在那儿干嘛呢？

en: Just then the two in question arrived at school.
zh: 就在那时，当事的那两个人到学校了。

en: Chewtarou is Mrs Tanaka's dog.
zh: 啾太郎是田中太太家的狗。

en: The family is sitting in a happy circle around the dining table.
zh: 一家人开开心心地围坐在餐桌旁。

en: I searched at the pub for the person I had met online, but there was nobody who looked like that.
zh: 我在酒吧里找那个网友，但没看到长得像那样的。

en: By the way, my English is absolutely hopeless.
zh: 顺便说一下，我的英语简直烂透了。

en: By the way, it also works with the wheel of a wheel mouse.
zh: 顺便一提，用鼠标滚轮也行。

en: By the way, this week - no matter what flags are set - it's a certainty that there will be no ecchi scenes. You'll just have to bear with it a while.
zh: 顺便说一下，这周不管立了什么Flag，肯定都不会有色色场景。你就先忍忍吧。

en: Incidentally, this room doesn't have anything like an air-conditioner. All it has is a fan.
zh: 顺便说一句，这屋里没空调之类的。就一电风扇。

en: Incidentally, this room doesn't have anything like an air conditioner. All it has is a hand-held paper fan.
zh: 顺便说一句，这屋里根本没空调。就只有把折扇。

en: Incidentally a motorway ramp is being constructed in the neighbourhood, a few hundred metres away, of my clinic.
zh: 顺便说下，就在我诊所附近几百米的地方，正在修高速公路的匝道。

en: The taxi collided head-on with a dumpster truck and was badly crushed.
zh: 那辆出租车跟垃圾车迎面撞上，被撞得稀烂。

en: It is a consolation that no one was killed.
zh: 幸好没人丧命。

en: Why not just let fly once in a while?
zh: 偶尔发泄一下不好吗？

en: Isn't it better to get drunk and cut loose once in a while and blow off the tension of daily frustration?
zh: 偶尔喝个烂醉撒个欢，排解掉平时的压力，不是更好吗？

en: "Mister"ing a tick? You're a funny kid.
zh: 给蜱虫加个“先生”？你这孩子真逗。

en: You see in this world there are only scoundrels and hypocrites.
zh: 你看，这世上只有流氓和伪君子。

en: You get drunk on just one centimeter? And Kensuke was such a heavy drinker.
zh: 才喝一厘米就醉了？健介明明那么能喝。

en: If so then I want you to do something for me. That will make us even.
zh: 要是这样的话，我想让你帮我个忙。这样咱们就两清了。

en: However if you get carried away you'll risk failure so take care!
zh: 不过你要是得意忘形的话可是会搞砸的，小心点！

en: However, the duty of a student is to study. So if you neglect the end of term test, that's a "no!".
zh: 不过学生的本分是学习。你要是把期末考试落下了，那可不行！

en: I'm back! Oh? Have we got a guest?
zh: 我回来了！诶？家里来客人了吗？

en: However the air's bad in Tokyo, and there are too many people so I can't settle down.
zh: 不过东京空气太差，人又多，我总觉得待不住。

en: If you make too many, we won't be able to sell them all, so don't go wild.
zh: 要是做多了卖不完，所以别做得太疯了。

en: However he has to take it at fixed intervals, just one day without taking it is swiftly fatal.
zh: 不过他得定时吃药，哪怕停药一天也会立马没命。

en: Therefore I'm giving up for now. I'll still try to check out other possibilities but ... I think hopes are slim.
zh: 所以我打算先放弃。我还是会试试别的路子，但……我觉得希望不大了。

en: So, well, it's a bitter decision for the student council to make as well. Give 'em a break.
zh: 所以嘛，学生会做这个决定也很痛苦。你就体谅一下吧。

en: However, in general, it seems that the Emperors had continued without seeking worldly power.
zh: 不过总的来说，历代天皇似乎都没有追求过世俗的权力。

en: Anyhow, just why is it that I have to be sent out in the middle of the night to buy a canned drink?
zh: 真是的，凭什么非得大半夜派我出来买罐装饮料啊？

en: Anyway what are you on about? Going around sleeveless in this cold.
zh: 话说你在想什么啊？大冷天的连个袖子都没有。

en: Generally once round this river side area is the basic morning course.
zh: 一般来说，绕着河边跑一圈就是最基本的晨练路线。

en: I-Is that OK? Calling you by your first name...
zh: 这、这样可以吗？直接叫你的名字……

en: Without flinching from that fact in the slightest, Chitose is spending today as well in fine spirit.
zh: 千岁完全没被那个事实吓到，今天也精神抖擞地过着。

en: That sort of flattery will get you nowhere.
zh: 那种奉承话对我没用。

en: I didn't request you to do that.
zh: 我又没求你那么做。

en: It is human nature to be bugged by such things.
zh: 这种事会在意也是人之常情。

en: If you're looking that sleepy I think anybody could tell.
zh: 你困成那样，谁都看得出来。

en: This is a really good thing, but one comment keeps bothering me.
zh: 这是件大好事，但有一个评价我一直很在意。

en: The work required to investigate that is boring and wearisome.
zh: 调查那件事的工作既枯燥又累人。

en: I just roughly allocated it to each function.
zh: 我只是大致把它们分配给了各个功能。

en: I'm afraid I can't do that. Leaving the cooker while frying is completely out of the question.
zh: 那可不行。炸东西的时候离开灶台是绝对不可以的。

en: That's the fact that avalanches occur after mountain fires.
zh: 事实就是，山火之后会发生雪崩。

en: You only imagine you've heard it.
zh: 那只是你产生的幻听。

en: That is a large force with 5,000 soldiers.
zh: 那是一支五千人的大部队。

en: That's what I want to say!
zh: 这正是我想说的！

en: That's a misunderstanding, for sure. You're giving me too much credit.
zh: 那绝对是误会。你太抬举我了。

en: With only that much pension I'm concerned about life in retirement.
zh: 就那点退休金，我很担心退休后的生活。

en: In comparison to which she's been in a really good mood recently.
zh: 相比之下，她最近心情倒是一直挺好的。

en: Besides which that's only if unpacking the luggage proceeds smoothly and is finished by Sunday morning.
zh: 而且那还得是在行李搬运顺畅、周日早上能弄完的前提下。

en: In any case please stop using "pretty" when describing a man.
zh: 反正请别再用“漂亮”来形容男人了。

en: Even so, kindergartens are sensitive to seasonal events.
zh: 即便如此，幼儿园对节庆活动还是很上心的。

en: People who can't do that aren't suited for the top.
zh: 连这点都做不到的人，是不适合坐到高位上的。

en: Well that's because in fiction that sort of fine detail gets skipped.
zh: 哎呀，那是因为在虚构作品里，这种细节通常都被略过了。

en: Soba is made of buckwheat flour, and udon and kishimen are made of plain wheat flour.
zh: 荞麦面是荞麦粉做的，而乌冬和宽面则是普通面粉做的。

en: Let's have a gander at this insolent man.
zh: 咱们来瞧瞧这个不知好歹的家伙。

en: That soil is rich in humus.
zh: 那片土里腐殖质含量很高。

en: I hope you will favor me with your guidance at that time.
zh: 到时候还请多多指教。

en: Thank you for all you did for me that time.

zh: 就这样，多亏了武田的那声尖叫，一艘路过的船发现了他们，他们才平安获救。

en: That's because, you see, I've known he isn't that sort of person from a long time back.
zh: 因为我很久以前就知道他不是那种人了。

en: This rat, up until just now he was my partner and now he's gone and turned on me.
zh: 这个混蛋，刚才还是我搭档，现在居然反过来咬我。

en: But by leaving the humidifier on all night in the morning condensation's pouring off the windows ...
zh: 可是加湿器开了一整晚，早上窗户上全是冷凝水……

en: 'Cuz it's a giant pain in the arse, if I don't wanna do something I just won't do it.
zh: 因为这事儿太麻烦了，只要是我不想做的，我就不做。

en: Keiko and Ichiro parted with mutual consent.
zh: 惠子和一郎是和平分手的。

en: Bill Gates announces intent to return advertising revenue to the users.
zh: 比尔·盖茨宣布打算将广告收入返还给用户。

en: Kei's very lucky! He has been since his birth.
zh: 小圭运气太好了！从出生起就一直这样。

en: Click: Quickly pushing the mouse's left hand side button once.
zh: 点击：就是快速按一下鼠标左键。

en: Green peas are high in iron and contain nutrients that improve the colour of fingernails.
zh: 豌豆的含铁量很高，还有能让指甲颜色变好看的营养成分。

en: O-oi!? Don't rip off my precious hair!
zh: 喂，喂！？别薅我那宝贵的头发啊！

en: Repeatedly slamming the clutch pedal, I somehow managed to get the clutch disengaged so I could just about drive for the time being.
zh: 我不停地猛踩离合，总算把它分开了，暂时还能勉强开一开。

en: Dammit, she completely ignored me.
zh: 可恶，她居然完全无视我。

en: Strangely, the cash register's total was 777 yen.
zh: 奇怪的是，收银台显示的金额刚好是777日元。

en: Gyoza stuffing? I made some gyoza at home but, possibly because I didn't have enough dough, I had some of the filling left over.
zh: 饺子馅？我在家包了饺子，可能是因为皮不够，最后剩了点馅。

en: Someone ploughed into me from behind at an intersection yesterday.
zh: 昨天在十字路口，有人从后面追尾撞了我。

en: Woodpeckers peck tree trunks with their long pointed beaks and eat insects found there.
zh: 啄木鸟用尖尖的长嘴啄树干，吃里面的虫子。

en: Karen's skirt is riding up.
zh: 凯伦的裙子卷上去了。

en: He became temporarily deranged.
zh: 他当时一时糊涂，精神错乱了。

en: He made heaps of money by ripping off naive suckers.
zh: 他靠坑那些天真的冤大头赚了大钱。

en: The curry was nothing special.
zh: 那咖喱也就那样，没什么特别的。

en: With the colour key program system, all colours are divided into two palettes, the "cool palette" and the "warm palette".
zh: 用色标程序系统的话，所有颜色都分成两组：“冷色调”和“暖色调”。

en: I hear you've done some pretty extreme stuff.
zh: 听说你做过不少挺过火的事儿。

en: The snail shot out its horns.
zh: 蜗牛一下子伸出了触角。

en: You were about to dump her flat out, weren't you?
zh: 你刚才是不是想干脆利落地把她给甩了？

en: I explained the situation, as this, that and such and such, but they just nodded along without showing much interest.
zh: 我把情况这样那样的说明了一下，但他们只是随口应着，没表现出什么兴趣。

en: According to the guidebook, this is the best restaurant around here.
zh: 旅游指南上说，这是这一带最好吃的餐馆。

en: Karl Marx says, "The history of all hitherto existing societies is the history of class struggles."
zh: 卡尔·马克思说过：“至今一切社会的历史都是阶级斗争的历史。”

en: Carpets have the effect of a dust pocket, with merit of sucking up dust and stopping it flying around, but you can say that effect backfires.
zh: 地毯就像个吸尘袋，能吸住灰尘不让它乱飞，但这也有反作用。

en: An offering of flowers had been placed at the grave.
zh: 坟前供奉着鲜花。

en: Needless to say, dealing in rice is a declining industry.
zh: 没必要多说，大米买卖已经是夕阳产业了。

en: Please take a bath.
zh: 去洗个澡吧。

en: I thought that if we lined up benches in the garden as well, we could achieve quite a seating capacity.
zh: 我在想，要是花园里也摆上长凳，能坐不少人呢。

en: Tea is like the lubricating oil of work to allow it to proceed smoothly.
zh: 茶就像是工作的润滑剂，能让事情进展得更顺当。

en: I've heard my grandma's stories so often that I'm heartily sick of them.
zh: 奶奶的故事我听了太多遍，耳朵都起茧子了。

en: The old woman was snugly sitting on a cushion.
zh: 老太太舒舒服服地坐在垫子上。

en: Grandfather is quite senile.
zh: 爷爷老糊涂得挺厉害。

en: Grandfather has caught a cold.
zh: 爷爷感冒了。

en: What the fuck are you up to taking advantage of his proximity to cling to him like a wet T-shirt?!
zh: 你搞什么鬼啊，趁机贴他那么紧，像件湿透的汗衫似的！

en: When the flatterer pipes, then the devil dances.
zh: 奉承者吹笛，魔鬼起舞。

en: Please drive off as soon as your child has left the car.
zh: 孩子下车后请尽快把车开走。

en: Big brother, you've got a bad fever?! Never mind the bags, rest in the shade of those trees!
zh: 哥，你发烧发得这么厉害？！别管行李了，快去那边的树荫下歇会儿！

en: Hey, is this fish tasty for real? It looks like a black porgy who'd fallen in with mobsters and been put on the country's most wanted list!?
zh: 嘿，这鱼真的能吃吗？看着像是一条混过黑社会、还上了全国通缉名单的黑鲷鱼！

en: As I don't have the money, it'll just be a short trip.
zh: 因为没钱，所以就只能来个短途游。

en: Before meeting your guests, be sure to carefully check that the toilet door locks.
zh: 见客人之前，一定要仔细检查一下厕所门能不能锁上。

en: Oh my. However much it's just a P.E. class; if you don't face it in real earnest, then when it comes to a real fight it won't do you any good.
zh: 哎呀，就算是体育课，要是不认真对待，真打起来的时候可一点用都没有。

en: What you call a 'charm', you know, is what girls wish upon that they may get together with the person they love and such like.
zh: 所谓的“护身符”啊，就是女孩子为了能跟喜欢的人在一起之类的愿望而求的东西。

en: Oi you, that's too much of a rip off by anyone's count! 6:4 is more than enough. Of course I'm the '6'.
zh: 喂，你这也太黑了吧！六四分成顶天了。当然，我拿六。

en: 4-speed automatic transmission is available as an option.
zh: 四速自动变速箱是选配。

en: Morning, Haruki. You've got bed hair.
zh: 早啊，春希。你头发睡乱了。

en: Good morning, Haruki. Your hair got messed up while you were sleeping.
zh: 早上好，春希。你睡觉的时候把头发压乱了。

en: Good morning, Haruki. Your hair looks like you just got out of bed.
zh: 早上好，春希。你的头发看起来就像刚起床一样。

en: Morning. Shall I dish up?
zh: 早。我来盛饭吗？

en: Whoops! There aren't many live coals left! Go make some kindling would you?
zh: 哎呀！火星子快没了！去弄点引火柴来行吗？

en: If you don't get the punch line, I'm sorry.
zh: 如果你没听懂这个笑点，那真不好意思。

en: Thanks to which I was up nearly all night.
zh: 多亏了那个，我几乎熬了一整夜。

en: Heck, with oboe players there are those who, rather than search for a reed that suits them, find it faster to make their own.
zh: 真是的，有些吹双簧管的人，与其去找适合自己的哨片，觉得还是自己动手做一个更快。

en: The toaster-oven's timer rings. The fragrant smell of well toasted bread.
zh: 烤箱的定时器响了，飘来一阵烤面包的香味。

en: Open source is the engine that drives technological innovation.
zh: 开源是驱动技术创新的引擎。

en: Hey, pops! What are you doing!
zh: 喂，老爷子！你干嘛呢！

en: Hey, there's no time left till the deadline, you know? Stop hanging around in a daze!
zh: 喂，离截止日期没剩多少时间了，别在那发呆了！

en: Hey, it's about time you quit it with the panty jokes. You'll put off the readers, you creeper!
zh: 喂，内裤笑话也该讲够了吧。读者会被你吓跑的，你个变态！

en: Oh, Tae, this cheese is a winner!
zh: 噢，阿妙，这奶酪绝了！

en: Don't race the car. We want to make it go as far as possible.
zh: 别飙车。我们要让这车尽可能开得远一点。

en: He-heh-heh, I'm terrible at sports so if I run a while my sides hurt right away.
zh: 嘿嘿嘿，我运动细胞不行，跑一会儿肋岔子就疼。

en: "A-hem!" Alice boasted, puffing up with pride.
zh: “咳咳！”爱丽丝得意洋洋地挺起胸膛夸耀道。

en: How about spending an elegant and blissful time at a beauty salon?
zh: 去美容院度过一段优雅又幸福的时光怎么样？

en: Hmm, did we have some breadcrumbs?
zh: 嗯，咱们家有面包糠吗？

en: Yes, thanks. Recently I've been roughing it so I was able to get a proper sleep for the first time in a while.
zh: 嗯，谢谢。最近我一直在吃苦头，总算能安稳地睡个好觉了。

en: The speed of the spread of AIDS is horrifyingly fast.
zh: 艾滋病的传播速度快得惊人。

en: An air conditioner is available as an optional extra.
zh: 空调是选配项。

en: Yes, it seems it was a misdiagnosis.
zh: 是的，看来是误诊了。

en: Wha? Study, reflexes, all the parameters are MAX! You've even saved money up to the limit ... Amazing.
zh: 啥？学习、反应力，所有属性全满？连存款都攒到上限了……太牛了。

en: So. Having had all that done to him it would be stranger if he wasn't enraged.
zh: 所以说啊，被那样对待，他不发火才怪呢。

en: If it goes well, I'll put you forward for a drama serial.
zh: 要是进展顺利，我推荐你去演电视剧。

en: I'm ashamed to tell such a muddled story in this dreary, rainy season, but please bear with me for a while.
zh: 在这阴雨连绵的季节讲这种糊涂账，真是不好意思，还请大家多包涵。

en: We'll also have to create a separate smoking section, won't we?
zh: 我们还得专门弄个吸烟区，对吧？

en: A brewery we finance has made a new sweet sake and brought some to us asking us to try it.
zh: 我们出资的一家酿酒厂酿出了新甜酒，送来请我们尝尝。

en: I wonder how it is when the web server uses cookies?
zh: 我在想，Web服务器使用Cookie时会是什么样？

en: No, Yumi put it in a thermos flask and brought it into the club room.
zh: 不是的，由美把它装在保温瓶里带进社团活动室了。

en: My internet connection was cut off.
zh: 我断网了。

en: Suspicion that this amounts to insider trading has strengthened.
zh: 涉嫌内幕交易的可疑性越来越大了。

en: In order to live happily and healthily with parakeets or parrots, you should understand the science of animal behavior for domesticated birds, and consider the emotional effect of eventually losing them.
zh: 为了跟虎皮鹦鹉或大鹦鹉健康快乐地生活在一起，你应该了解家养鸟类的动物行为学，并且考虑到最终失去它们时带来的情感冲击。

en: Remove the cap from the ink refill bottle, fill the dropper with ink, and drip an appropriate amount onto the marker's core.
zh: 拧开墨水补充液的盖子，用滴管吸取墨水，然后适量滴在记号笔的笔芯上。

en: There's no need to tell on him and mess up their marriage.
zh: 没必要打他的小报告，毁了人家的婚姻。

en: It's getting more and more shadowy, soon it will be twilight.
zh: 影子越来越长了，马上就要到黄昏了。

en: The downside, well, it's how thoroughly work gets mixed up with my private life.
zh: 缺点嘛，就是工作和私生活完全混在一起了。

en: Not at all, that's perfectly fine. Calling each other by one's given name is a good thing; it produces a feeling of fellowship.
zh: 没事，完全没关系。互相直呼其名挺好的，能增加亲近感。

en: Oh man! Aki in a china dress was so cute. I almost lost it then.
zh: 妈呀！穿旗袍的亚希太可爱了。我当时差点就没把持住。

en: You can give it back whenever you want to as I bought that book for missionary work.
zh: 这书你什么时候还都行，反正我是为了传教才买的。

en: I'm always writing weird and hoopy stuff so I'm sure it's difficult to comment on.
zh: 我老是写些乱七八糟的怪东西，肯定挺难评价的吧。

en: I'm always writing strange things, so I'm sure it's difficult to comment on.
zh: 我总写些奇奇怪怪的东西，估计你也很难接话。

en: I always use the steps, but...it's scary how they wobble...so I'd like you to hold them steady.
zh: 我一直用这梯子，但这晃得也太吓人了……能不能帮我扶稳点。

en: He was always filthy and looked like he wasn't given enough food.
zh: 他整天脏兮兮的，看着就像没吃饱饭一样。

en: Having once landed the monster immediately jumped again and was over my head.
zh: 那个怪物一落地就立刻又跳了起来，直接跃过了我的头顶。

en: With all that we might have been better off just to have stayed home.
zh: 早知道这样，咱们还不如老老实实在家待着呢。

en: You're right when you say how high the wall is; I was nervous at first, too.
zh: 你说得对，这墙确实高，我刚开始的时候也挺紧张的。

en: The container may be the best in Japan, but if the contents are third class, then isn't it completely meaningless?
zh: 就算这包装是全日本最好的，如果里面的东西是三流货，那不也一点意义没有吗？

en: No, it's a national treasure, you see. This is the first time we've seen it as well.
zh: 不，你看，这可是国宝。我们也是头一回见到。

en: No, please don't concern yourself. I have learnt to do as the Romans when in Rome.
zh: 没事，别在意。我已经学会入乡随俗了。

en: Never mind that. After all up till now he's stuffed himself on huge profit selling high brand-name goods of no real worth. From now on he can just try his best at honest trade.
zh: 别管那个了。反正他以前靠卖那些徒有虚名的名牌货赚翻了，以后他就老老实实做生意吧。

en: OK, you keep quiet while we're in the store.
zh: 行了，进店以后你给我闭嘴，别乱说话。

en: If those little brats of sisters are good enough I'll make a gift of them to you!
zh: 要是那几个小鬼妹妹你还看得上眼，我就把她们送你了！

en: Don't think you'll always be able to placate me with food!
zh: 别以为回回拿吃的就能把我哄好！

en: Obviously a normal woman would lose interest if she saw a book like that!
zh: 正常女生看到这种书肯定都会没兴趣的吧！

en: Idiot, I've forgotten that two-timing bitch.
zh: 傻瓜，我早就把那个劈腿的贱货给忘了。

en: You're really handy, aren't you? Don't you think you'd make a good house-husband?
zh: 你手挺巧的嘛，没想过当个全职煮夫吗？

en: As a man, no a human being, you're the pits!
zh: 作为男人，不，作为一个人，你简直烂透了！

en: You're a troublesome person!
zh: 你这人可真够麻烦的！

en: We used to compile survey results using spreadsheet programs but recently we feel that database software's summing methods are quicker so we use databases to total them.
zh: 以前我们用表格处理调研结果，但最近觉得数据库的统计方法更快，所以改用数据库来汇总了。

en: That's a picture of a monkey associated with the Year of the Monkey.
zh: 那是一张跟猴年相关的猴子图。

en: That was as awkward as being seen coming out of a love hotel in the morning.
zh: 那场面尴尬得就像大清早被人撞见从情趣酒店出来一样。

en: Down there hurts, down there. Er, what do you call them? Testicles? In any case a male's 'important parts'.
zh: 下面疼，就那儿。呃，叫什么来着？睾丸？反正就是男人的“重要部位”。

en: Hello, what's that? Somebody doing street theatre or something?
zh: 哎，那是什么？有人在演街头剧吗？

en: Eh? This tune ... The playlist has looped.
zh: 诶？这曲子……歌单循环了。

en: If you oxidise an alcohol you get an aldehyde but what do you get if you oxidise an aldehyde?
zh: 醇氧化之后是醛，那醛氧化之后是什么？

en: Alkalis neutralize acids.
zh: 碱能中和酸。

en: Well, it's just like the proverb "fine feathers make a fine bird". You look really good when you wear a suit.
zh: 俗话说得好，“佛靠金装，人靠衣装”。你穿西装真的挺帅。

en: Really? You didn't show much interest before. I wonder what's got into you?
zh: 真的吗？你以前没啥兴趣啊，这是刮的哪阵风？

en: In reports in America, guerrilla resistance by the Iraq military is called terrorism.
zh: 在美国的报道里，伊拉克军队的游击抵抗被称作恐怖主义。

en: Just how tiresome was it to argue straight against the phrase "Don't blindly follow America's lead!"
zh: 直面反驳“不要盲从美国”这种话，到底有多费劲啊？

en: In American football, a touchdown scores six points.
zh: 美式橄榄球里，达阵得六分。

en: The Amazon River meanders through northern Brazil.
zh: 亚马逊河蜿蜒流经巴西北部。

en: I've ordered a book from Amazon.com.
zh: 我在亚马逊上订了本书。

en: Give him my best regards.
zh: 替我向他问好。

en: It seems they don't have the slightest intention of restoring it.
zh: 看来他们压根儿就没打算修复它。

en: That daimyo holds a fief yielding 100,000 koku of rice.
zh: 那位大名拥有一块十万石的领地。

en: That village is the enemy's last stronghold.
zh: 那个村子是敌人的最后一个据点。

en: That red cloth is a "fukusa"; it is a vital tool used to cleanse the tea equipment.
zh: 那块红布叫“袱纱”，是擦拭茶具的重要工具。

en: The way that woman goes on with men shocks me.
zh: 那个女人跟男人们勾勾搭搭的样子真让我吃惊。

en: That movie's downright dirty.
zh: 那部电影简直太下流了。

en: That team has nothing but strong players.
zh: 那个队全是强手。

en: That team has a strong lineup.
zh: 那个队的阵容很强。

en: You see, Kyohei, this question ... it's about saline solution but ...
zh: 那个，恭平，这道题……是关于生理盐水的，但是……

en: Y'know we're short of money to have fun and ... Well to be blunt, gimme!
zh: 那个，我们玩儿的钱不够了……直说吧，给钱！

en: Er, Sir? What's written on the blackboard isn't an exponential function but a trigonometric one ...
zh: 呃，老师？黑板上写的不是指数函数，是三角函数……

en: If you're placed in a position of authority, it is imperative that you take into consideration that point, if even just a little ...
zh: 如果你处在领导位置，多少也得考虑一下那一点啊……

en: Will Apple's new model notebook be announced on schedule?
zh: 苹果的新款笔记本会按计划发布吗？

en: I had expected an outright refusal, but to my surprise she agreed.
zh: 我本以为会被断然拒绝，没想到她竟然答应了。

en: I'd like to have a girl the first time. Look, they say 'First a girl, then a boy' don't they?
zh: 我头胎想要个女孩。不是说“先生女儿，后生儿子”嘛。

en: If you've got time to play around on an acoustic guitar, practice your bass!
zh: 有时间在那儿瞎弹吉他，还不如练练你的贝斯！

en: Use acrylic paint.
zh: 用丙烯颜料。

en: Use only as directed.
zh: 请按说明使用。

en: When the scum stops appearing pour the syrup back into a clean bottle and keep it in the fridge.
zh: 等没有浮沫了，就把糖浆倒回干净的瓶子里，放冰箱存着。

en: Apart from his heel, Achilles was invulnerable.
zh: 除了脚后跟，阿喀琉斯是全身刀枪不入的。

en: The Oscar ceremonies are Hollywood's biggest extravaganza.
zh: 奥斯卡颁奖典礼是好莱坞最大的盛事。

en: If you sleep on your back it's easier for your upper airway to be obstructed because your tongue, uvula, etc. slip towards the back of your throat.
zh: 仰着睡的话，舌头和小舌头这些会往喉咙后方滑，更容易堵住上呼吸道。

en: I'm a self-supporting student so I can't have that sort of high class thing.
zh: 我是个勤工俭学的学生，买不起那种高档货。

en: I'm putting myself through school, so I can't have things that are that expensive.
zh: 我得自己挣钱交学费，所以买不起那么贵的东西。

en: Ahh, silly me, I've messed up again.
zh: 哎呀，我真笨，又搞砸了。

en: With all of his tricks he has mastered, he will be able to deal with any formidable client.
zh: 凭他掌握的那些招数，什么样的难搞客户他都能应付。

en: Regardless of the subject, he pretends to know all about it.
zh: 不管聊什么，他都装得跟什么都懂似的。

en: She never uses paper towels. She is such a tree hugger, you know.
zh: 她从不用纸巾。你知道的，她是个超级环保主义者。

en: He doesn't realise that he's tone deaf.
zh: 他没意识到自己唱歌五音不全。

en: You say po-tah-to I say po-tay-to. Rika is just that sort of girl. There's no way to win a battle of words with her.
zh: 反正她横竖都有理。梨花就是那种女孩子，跟她斗嘴你是赢不了的。

en: The shopping arcade was covered with lots of paper decorations.
zh: 商店街挂满了各种纸装饰。

en: Yes, a man is as good as his word. But I'll just be helping, you understand. You'll have to work too.
zh: 是啊，君子一言，驷马难追。但我只是帮帮忙，你得明白，你也得干活。

en: Ah, I reckon you go straight down this prefectural road ...
zh: 啊，我觉得顺着这条县道一直走就行……

en: Ah, could it be you're embarrassed to be called by your first name?
zh: 啊，难道被叫名字你会不好意思吗？

en: Ah, could we swap our mobile numbers next time?
zh: 啊，下次能交换一下手机号吗？

en: Ah, well I've bandaged it for the meantime but if that's awkward then it's fine to replace it with a plaster when you get home.
zh: 啊，我先给你包扎好了，要是觉得不舒服，回家换成创可贴也行。

en: Ah, if you can dub it, can I ask for a copy as well?
zh: 啊，你要是能刻录的话，能不能也帮我刻一份？

en: Oh yes, you're right. Well, it's the way you shop that's tight-fisted then.
zh: 哦，对，你说得对。那看来是你买东西太抠门了。

en: Ah, sorry. Megumi, could you get me the conditioner?
zh: 啊，抱歉。小惠，能帮我拿一下护发素吗？

en: E-eh? I somehow seem to feel a very threatening aura...
zh: 诶？我怎么感觉有一股杀气……

en: With Windows OS systems 'administrator account' corresponds to 'root'.
zh: 在 Windows 系统里，“管理员账户”对应的就是 “root”。

en: 'That' has only the two cases, nominative and objective, and it does not inflect depending on the case.
zh: “That” 只有主格和宾格两种形式，而且词形不会随格位改变。

en: He was PK'ed, I resurrected him.
zh: 他被 PK 了，我把他复活了。

en: I got the OK so I unthinkingly created the clichéd 'grass runner thief/bard' character.
zh: 拿到许可之后，我脑子一热就建了个很俗气的“跑图贼”角色。

en: OK. I'm just next door so if you can get that assurance let me know.
zh: 行。我就在隔壁，你要是确定了就跟我说一声。

en: ODS super alloy is produced by the mechanical alloy method following powder metallurgy.
zh: ODS 超合金是在粉末冶金之后通过机械合金化法生产的。

en: What Microsoft is launching is a beta version of its "NetShow streaming server"; it supplies video and audio on demand.
zh: 微软推出的是 “NetShow 流媒体服务器” 的测试版，提供音视频点播。

en: On Jul 18th Mark/Space released an updated version of Missing Sync for Windows Mobile for the Mac OS X.
zh: 7 月 18 日，Mark/Space 发布了针对 Mac OS X 的 Missing Sync for Windows Mobile 更新版。

en: Although it's "Mac OS X", that doesn't mean that the Mac OS code itself has been upgraded to a new version.
zh: 虽然叫 “Mac OS X”，但这并不意味着 Mac OS 的代码本身已经升级到了新版本。

en: Last time I sent out my humble work, the afterword to "left-right", written on the promise that you'd keep it secret from him, this time it's the afterword to that afterword.
zh: 上次发的是我的拙作《左右》的后记，还说好了要瞒着他的，这次是那篇后记的补记。

en: We have explained that HTML is, as a basic rule, elements marked up with open and close tags.
zh: 我们已经解释过，HTML 的基本原则就是用开始和结束标签来标记元素。

en: May be distributed in accordance with the GPL.
zh: 可根据 GPL 协议进行分发。

en: Fold A-7 in half and stick it together.
zh: 把 A-7 对折，然后粘在一起。

en: Among the divisors of 90, how many numbers are not divisible by 9?
zh: 在 90 的约数中，有多少个不能被 9 整除？

en: By the age of seven, he had already made his own bow and arrows.
zh: 七岁的时候，他已经会自己做弓箭了。

en: 60,000 lucky number request: I got a request to draw an illustration for the site of Beikyu, who hit the lucky number, "Standing By A Little Maple Tree".
zh: 6 万踩楼纪念请求：我收到了中奖者 Beikyu 的请求，为他的网站画一张名为《站在小枫树旁》的插画。

en: See the footnote on page 5.
zh: 见第 5 页的脚注。

en: What is 5814 rounded to the nearest thousand?
zh: 5814 四舍五入到千位是多少？

en: What's 5,814 rounded to the nearest thousand?
zh: 5814 四舍五入到千位是多少？

en: The chicks hatched in April have also become 5 months old. Their bodies are about the same size as their parents, about the only difference is that the roosters have smaller crests than their father.
zh: 四月份孵出来的雏鸡也 5 个月大了。它们的体型跟爹妈差不多大，唯一的区别就是小公鸡的鸡冠比它们爹的要小。

en: The 48-year-old Ryouichi Kawakatsu took over as coach at Fukuoka in June this year, but his fate is closely linked with that of 46-year-old Matsuda.
zh: 48 岁的川胜良一在今年 6 月接任了福冈队的教练，但他的命运和 46 岁的松田紧紧连在一起。

en: Please enter a telephone number where you can be contacted during the day, too.
zh: 请输入一个白天也能联系到您的电话号码。

en: So I thought my date, er rather, offline-meeting was going to be just me and her but things aren't that easy.
zh: 我原以为这次约会——呃，准确说是线下见面，就我和她两个人，但事情没那么简单。

en: After the second innings, the opposing pitcher recovered too, and it turned into a pitching duel.
zh: 第二局以后，对方投手也找回了状态，比赛变成了投手战。

en: The first low kick was the set-up for this!?
zh: 刚才那记低踢竟然是为了这招做铺垫！？

en: I'm teaching two courses, year one's "Self-expression for University Students" and year two's "Food Chemistry".
zh: 我带两门课，大一的“大学生自我表达”和大二的“食品化学”。

en: Though it's now January, it's warm like early spring.
zh: 虽说是1月，但这天气暖和得跟早春似的。

en: When converting 1 mole of ice into water, and 1 mole of water into steam, which requires more energy?
zh: 把1摩尔的冰化成水，再把1摩尔的水变成蒸汽，哪个更费能量？

en: Just 13 people? That's all?
zh: 才13个人？就这么多？

en: NOTE: Typo corrected. Thanks for pointing it out.
zh: 备注：错别字改过来了。多谢指出来。

en: There are things I'd like to say but to butt in now would be what they call uncouth.
zh: 我确实有些话想说，不过这时候插嘴有点儿不礼貌。

en: Well, shall we devote ourselves to study today as well?
zh: 那么，今天也要好好学习吗？

en: 'Don't worry. I'm doing fine. :-) ' "Eh ... smiley-face?"
zh: “别担心，我挺好的。:-)” “呃……笑脸？”

en: It's no good saying 'Isn't it?' to me ... have you double-booked again?
zh: 跟我说“是不是”也没用啊……你是不是又把时间撞在一起了？

en: "Nice person," that's the word girls used to call men to indicate that they aren't possible objects of romantic interest.
zh: “好人”，就是女生拿来称呼那些她们没兴趣交往的男生的词儿。

en: "Kaname, when can you leave?" "It's till closing so it takes till eight."
zh: “要，你什么时候能走？”“得等到打烊，差不多到八点。”

en: "You know a kid called Megumi Noda, right?" "Noda?" "Makes weird sounds like 'Hagya', 'Fugi'"
zh: “你认识一个叫野田惠的小孩儿吧？”“野田？”“就是会发出‘哈呀’、‘呜叽’这种怪声的那个。”

en: It was proposed that the term "blind person" be replaced with the term "visually impaired person".
zh: 有人提议把“盲人”改称“视障人士”。

en: "Talking about 108, that's the number of worldly passions." "What worldly passions have you got then?" "I could say, but it'll get censored out."
zh: “说到108，那是烦恼的数量。”“那你都有啥烦恼？”“说倒是能说，就是会被和谐掉。”

en: How many strokes does the kanji for "michi" have?
zh: “道”字有几画？

en: You don't need to bring up "A Winter Sonata" to show that South Korean culture is having an unexpected boom in Japan.
zh: 根本不用提《冬季恋歌》，韩流在日本火得不行是不争的事实。

en: "I'm not angry. Look, see this smiling face?" "That's what they call a forced smile!"
zh: “我没生气，你看，我这不是笑着呢吗？”“你那叫强颜欢笑！”

en: "Prospects for repair?" "Prof. Shubaishen, the leader of the system development team, is presently unwell so we think it will take a while longer ..."
zh: “修复进度怎么样？”“系统开发组的组长舒白申教授现在身体不适，所以估计还得再等一阵子……”

en: "How are things going?" "Terrific. Income and profit are continuing to rise steadily."
zh: “最近怎么样？”“好极了。营收和利润都在稳步增长。”

en: "I'm too old to be playing with bugs," said the boy.
zh: “我这年纪已经不玩虫子了，”那个男孩说。

en: "I'm getting too old to be playing with bugs", said the boy.
zh: “我已经过了玩虫子的年纪了，”那个男孩说。

en: "Short tempered as ever." He said while dodging Reika's fist.
zh: “还是那么急脾气。”他一边躲着丽香的拳头一边说。

en: The Niagara Falls are famous as a world leading tourist resort.
zh: 尼亚加拉大瀑布是世界著名的旅游胜地。

en: Don't you know the saying "good manners even between friends?"
zh: 你没听说过“亲而有礼”吗？

en: "Going to the little girl's room" is an euphemistic expression for "going to the toilet."
zh: “去小姑娘房间”是“上厕所”的一种委婉说法。

en: The "predicate" is that part that shows the action in the sentence. In Japanese it would be the part that ends in "da", "suru", etc.
zh: “谓语”是句子里表示动作的部分。在日语里，就是以“だ”、“する”这些结尾的部分。

en: A "modifier" has, just as it sounds, the role of embellishing sentences.
zh: “修饰语”顾名思义，就是起到润色句子的作用。

en: The "subject" is the person or object to carry out the action in the sentence. Transformed to Japanese it would be the part that end in "wa" or "ga".
zh: “主语”是句子里发出动作的人或物。换成日语，就是以“は”或“が”结尾的部分。

en: "Car" is a synonym of "automobile".
zh: “Car”和“automobile”是同义词。

en: "It's the age of BL!" "Bee el?" "Yup, Boys' Love. Books and such dealing with romance between boys."
zh: “现在是BL的时代！”“BL？”“对，就是耽美。就是那些讲男生之间谈恋爱的书什么的。”

en: "Don't look alike do you?" "That's because we're fraternal twins."
zh: “长得不像吧？”“那是因为我们是异卵双胞胎。”

en: "You don't look like each other." "That's because we're fraternal twins."
zh: “你们长得一点儿也不像。”“因为我们是异卵双胞胎。”

en: I think to clearly distinguish opinion from fact is important.
zh: 我觉得分清观点和事实挺重要的。

en: "It's right after yesterday so ... that is ... do your genitals hurt or ...?" "It still smarts a little but..."
zh: “毕竟才过了一天……那个……下面还疼吗？”“还有点儿隐隐作痛……”

en: "Does your back hurt?" "No, not really." "Oh, that's something then, isn't it?"
zh: “腰疼吗？”“不怎么疼。”“哦，那还算好，对吧？”

en: There are a lot of people who say, "it says this in Koujien," and use that dictionary as the only grounds for their argument.
zh: 很多人动不动就说“《广辞苑》上就是这么写的”，把这本词典当成唯一的论据。

en: "What's the difference between erotic and kinky?" "Erotic is when you use a feather and kinky is when you use a whole chicken."
zh: “‘色情’和‘变态’有什么区别？”“‘色情’是用一根羽毛，‘变态’是直接用一整只鸡。”

en: In contrast to his "not bad looks but seems a bit of a dandy" appearance, he didn't have a girlfriend and he wasn't particularly fast with the ladies.
zh: 虽然他长得不赖，看着像个花花公子，但其实没女朋友，也不怎么讨女人欢心。

en: "If it's a light workout, OK." "Right, so will we allow crotch-kicking and eyeball crushing?"
zh: “要是轻度运动还行。”“行，那踢裆和抠眼珠子算吗？”

en: "This is the police. Would you mind coming down to the station?" "W-why?" "You can't think it's not a crime to go shooting guns off in the middle of town?!"
zh: “警察。请跟我们去局里走一趟吧。”“为、为什么？”“你该不会觉得在市中心乱开枪不算犯罪吧？！”

en: "If it's money then I'm not lending any" I said point blank.
zh: “要是借钱的话，一分也没有。”我直截了当地说。

en: "A passionate kiss scene in a school corridor ... I've heard all about it!" "It wasn't passionate! That's an exaggeration..."
zh: “教学楼走廊里的激吻……我可都听说了！”“哪有激吻啊！太夸张了吧……”

en: "Let's meet up outside for a date." "If you've got that much free time come and help unpack!"
zh: “咱们出去约会吧。”“你要是这么闲，就过来帮我拆箱子！”

en: "Mmmmn ... maybe I'll have a hair of the dog." "Whoa, hold up a mo! Here, I cooked roast fish for this morning. You ought to be able to eat this OK."
zh: “嗯……要不再喝口酒透透？”“哎，等等！给，我早上烤了鱼。这个你应该吃得下。”

en: Ha-ha-ha-hah! No worry! I brazenly bluffed.
zh: 哈哈哈哈！没关系！我硬着头皮在那儿瞎吹。

en: "No, not so much. At most comparing sizes, telling dirty stories." "Sizes of what?" "Of 'that'."
zh: “没，也没什么。顶多也就是比比大小，讲讲荤段子。”“比什么的大小？”“就‘那个’的大小呗。”

en: "Look! Thanks to you I'm getting dumped all the time." "Oh? Isn't it just because of your everyday behaviour?"
zh: “你看！托你的福，我老是被甩。”“哦？难道不是因为你平时表现太差了吗？”

en: "Well, that is, it's not something I can boast of," in fact it's not something I can talk unashamedly about in public.
zh: “这个嘛，倒也不是什么值得夸耀的事，”其实就是没法在人前说出口的事。

en: "Well he looks odd on the surface ... but he's even odder on the inside." "You're really not helping me there."
zh: “他表面上看挺怪的……但其实内心更怪。”“你这话听着一点儿也没安慰到我。”

en: "I'm not sleeping. I'm always just skiving off." "That way's even worse!"
zh: “我没在睡觉。我一直只是在摸鱼而已。”“那样反而更糟吧！”

en: I was asked, "You OK, kid?". I replied, "Fine."
zh: 有人问我：“没事吧，孩子？”我回答：“没事。”

en: "Did you possibly not notice until just now?" "Er, well ... it was just so beyond my imagination that ..."
zh: “难道你直到刚才都没发现吗？”“呃，那个……简直超出了我的想象，所以……”

en: The phrase "make a bee line for" expresses the look of how a bee heads straight for food with speed and energy.
zh: “make a bee line for”这个短语形容的是蜜蜂发现食物后，充满活力地飞速径直冲过去的样子。

en: "What is she saying?" "You don't even know 'norito'?" "Norito?" "It's something like a Shinto spell."
zh: “她在说什么？”“你连‘祝词’都不知道吗？”“祝词？”“就是类似神社咒语之类的东西。”

en: "So it's built from stone?" "It's ordinary reinforced concrete."
zh: “是用石头盖的吗？”“是普通的钢筋混凝土。”

en: "How did it go?" "They said it was acute appendicitis."
zh: “怎么样了？”“说是急性阑尾炎。”

en: Rather - who the heck are you?! Iori enquired of the girl, ignoring my form rolling around on the floor.
zh: “倒是你，到底是谁啊？！”伊织无视了在地上打滚的我，对着那个女孩问道。

en: "I was just admiring your roses. They're absolutely gorgeous." "Oh, I'm flattered. Thank you."
zh: “我刚才在欣赏你的玫瑰。真的太美了。”“噢，过奖了，谢谢。”

en: "Say, shall we try a questionnaire with the boarding students?" "Ah! One of those things they call 'marketing research'."
zh: “哎，我们要不要对寄宿生做个问卷调查？”“啊！就是那个所谓的‘市场调研’吧。”

en: To say that it gives the impression of a cheap toy is unfair to cheap toys.
zh: 说这玩意儿像廉价玩具，简直是在侮辱廉价玩具。

en: "No, no! That isn't the smiling face we are looking for." It was a 'smirk' either that or a 'sneer'.
zh: “不，不对！这不是我们要找的那种笑脸。”那顶多是“假笑”，或者干脆就是“冷笑”。

en: "Y-You OK? Not hurt?", I enquire timidly. "Ah, no, I'm fine."
zh: “你、你没事吧？没受伤吧？”我怯生生地问道。“啊，没事。”

en: "Do I really have that good a personality?" "Impossible. After all, there's this time as well, but in middle school you sold off girl's pants all over to bring in the money."
zh: “我的人品真的有那么好吗？”“不可能。毕竟除了这次，你初中时还到处卖女生内裤赚钱呢。”

en: "It is when you overcome that, that a boy becomes something-something" "If you're trying to say something important sounding keep talking right to the end!"
zh: “只有克服了那个，男孩子才能成为那什么……”“既然想说点听起来深奥的话，就给我一口气说完啊！”

en: "Never mind that, what's with that get up ... a swimming suit!?" "That's right. Sexy isn't it? Feeling horny?"
zh: “先别管那个，你这身打扮是怎么回事……泳装？！”“没错。挺性感的吧？心跳加速了吗？”

en: "Is that implying that I go get some sugar in me and then work more?" "Er?" "No, sorry. I'm just sulking a bit."
zh: “你是在暗示我补充点糖分然后接着干活吗？”“额？”“没事，抱歉，我就是发两句牢骚。”

en: "What was that person saying?" "He couldn't communicate in Russian at all so I told him off in Russian."
zh: “那个人在说什么？”“他根本没法用俄语交流，所以我用俄语把他训了一顿。”

en: "Oh? If you're free get the cleaning done." "What's up with that? Don't order your brother around!"
zh: “噢？你要是闲着就去打扫卫生。”“搞什么啊？别对我呼来唤去的，我可是你哥！”

en: "You're right, certainly you don't seem to have been into it today." "Eh! You can tell that sort of thing?"
zh: “确实，你今天看起来确实没怎么在状态。”“哎！这你都能看出来？”

en: "That's right. At the least I wish they'd add one to the first floor as well ... Wait a mo! Why are you here!?" "'Why' is obvious isn't it? It's so we can go to the toilet together."
zh: “没错。起码一楼也该加一个……等等！你怎么在这儿？！”“‘为什么’不是明摆着吗？当然是为了和你一起上厕所啊。”

en: "Oh? Then, as I expected, I've been around longer than you. This year I'm 20-mumble years old." "What does that tell me?"
zh: “噢？那果然还是我年纪大一点。我今年二十……几岁了。”“这能说明什么？”

en: "Rock-paper-scissors, OK?" "Rock." "Sciss... paper." "You cheated!"
zh: “猜拳，好吗？”“石头。”“剪……布。”“你耍赖！”

en: "Right, I'll check your work, OK?" "Please go ahead and inspect. I think I gave it a good go."
zh: “行，我来检查一下你干得怎么样。”“请随便检查。我觉得我干得挺卖力的。”

en: "Oh no! I left my umbrella on the train." "You are a scatterbrain!"
zh: “糟了！我把伞忘在电车上了。”“你可真是个小糊涂蛋！”

en: "Will they be open this early in the morning?" "They'll let me in on sight."
zh: “大清早的，他们开门了吗？”“他们看在我的面子上会让我进去的。”

en: "This is ..." "Working glove and trowel. One of a gardening club's basic tools"
zh: “这是……”“劳保手套和泥铲。园艺社的基本工具之一。”

en: "Can you cut it like this, please?" "A little shorter in the front and a little longer on the sides, please."
zh: “能帮我这样剪吗？”“前面剪短一点，侧面留长一点，谢谢。”

en: Use a brief expression of condolence, such as: "On this sad occasion we grieve with you".
zh: 使用简短的吊唁词，比如：“在这个悲痛的时刻，我们与你们同在。”

en: "Up to this point has been the official story, which Kirika also knows." "By which you mean there is also an unofficial?"
zh: “到目前为止说的都是公开的情况，雾香也知道。”“所以你的意思是，还有不公开的版本？”

en: "Here ... the sound of the cicadas is different." "Oh my, I'm impressed you noticed. You've got a good sense of pitch!"
zh: “这里的……蝉鸣声不太一样。”“天哪，亏你能发现。你音准真好！”

en: "Kenji's in hospital?" "That's a real pisser..."
zh: “健司住院了？”“那可真够郁闷的……”

en: "Pretty gem, isn't it?" Not knowing if it was a suitable subject or not, but anyway I tried to get her interest that way.
zh: “很漂亮的宝石吧？”虽然不知道这个话题合不合适，总之我试着以此引起她的兴趣。

en: "'Fox's wedding'." "Er ...?" "Today, with an 81 percent likelihood, it will be clear skies but, depending on location, there will be sun showers."
zh: “‘狐狸娶亲’。”“额……？”“今天有81%的概率是晴天，但局部地区会有太阳雨。”

en: "Kai dear! I'm really sad! Having my first experience in this way." "Eh?" "Skip-ping-town."
zh: “小海！我好难过！居然以这种方式献出了‘第一次’。”“哎？”“跑——路。”

en: Add "Men" and the goods take off.
zh: 加上“男士”二字，货就卖疯了。

en: "I have to pee." "Jonny, that's not the right thing to say. Say, 'Excuse me. I need to go to the toilet.'"
zh: “我要尿尿。”“强尼，不该这么说。要说：‘抱歉，我要去洗手间。’”

en: "Strange isn't it. By the schedule around now we should have all witnessed an UFO, and united in researching." "From 'witnessed' it's never gunna happen."
zh: “很奇怪吧。按计划，这时候我们应该都见过UFO，并团结起来在研究呢。”“从‘见过’开始就不可能发生吧。”

en: Mr. Naruhodo's law firm is "The World's Leading Energy Law Firm".
zh: 成步堂先生的法律事务所是“世界领先的能源法律事务所”。

en: "Er, that 'mixer party' thing is then ..." "Just a normal get together."
zh: “呃，那个‘联谊会’其实就是……”“就是普通的聚会而已。”

en: "Yes, the bisque-doll-like Erika" "Th-that expression is a little embarrassing, could you stop using it?"
zh: “是的，像陶瓷娃娃一样的绘里香。”“这、这种形容太让人害羞了，能不能别这么说？”

en: "My wonderful wife is so stingy that ..." "You boasting? Or complaining?"
zh: “我那了不起的老婆太抠门了，所以……”“你是在显摆，还是在抱怨？”

en: "Just pay up already, I'm saying." "Hand over the money, Yo!"
zh: “我说明白点，赶紧给钱。”“给钱，小子！”

en: "That's the new head of the student council?" "Cool, isn't he?" "Rather, pretty boy?"
zh: “那就是新任学生会长？”“挺帅的吧？”“或者该说，是个美少年？”

en: "Eh? Where's Keiko?" "Said she's got a parent and child meeting so she'll be late."
zh: “哎？惠子呢？”“说是有个亲子会，所以会晚点来。”

en: "Oh? Where's Keiko?" "She said that she has a teacher, parent and child meeting so she'll be late."
zh: “噢？惠子呢？”“她说要参加家长教师见面会，所以会晚点到。”

en: "What is your relationship to him?" "I'm his father."
zh: “你和他是什么关系？”“我是他父亲。”

en: "Where have those six got to?" "They've escaped."
zh: “那六个人去哪了？”“他们逃跑了。”

en: "Ah, a raw egg for me!" "Is one enough?" "Yep, if I need more I'll top it up."
zh: “啊，给我来个生鸡蛋！”“一个够吗？”“够了，不够我再加。”

en: Argument continues about the "White collar exemption" that exempts specific white collar workers from the "8 hours in 1 day, 40 hours a week," working hours fixed by the Labour Standards Act.
zh: 关于“白领豁免制”的争论仍在继续，该制度豁免了特定的白领劳动者遵守《劳动基准法》中规定的“每天8小时，每周40小时”的工作时长。

en: "... in other words, sex!?" "Geez, you don't beat around the bush!"
zh: “……换句话说，就是上床？！”“天哪，你也太直接了吧！”

en: He's looking good.
zh: 他看起来状态不错。

en: How dashing!
zh: 真帅啊！

en: NB: Pictures may have become dead links.
zh: 注：图片链接可能已经失效。

en: It has been said that "a sucker's born every minute" and every 'confidence man' knows it.
zh: 俗话说“这世上每分钟都有傻子出生”，骗子们对这一点心知肚明。

en: People communicate approval by nodding, by clapping their hands, by smiling or laughing.
zh: 人们通过点头、鼓掌、微笑或大笑来表示赞同。

en: Have you ever seen it hail?
zh: 你见过下冰雹吗？

en: It's hailing.
zh: 下冰雹了。

en: The pheasant would not be shot but for its cries.
zh: 野鸡要不是因为叫唤，也不会被射中。

en: A burning meteoroid produces a meteor.
zh: 流星体燃烧时会产生流星。

en: It seems that there will be a storm soon.
zh: 看来很快就要下暴雨了。

en: Before long, the ghost disappeared into a thick fog.
zh: 没过多久，那个鬼魂就消失在浓雾中了。

en: All things die in time.
zh: 万物终有一死。

en: And I begged her on my bended knees.
zh: 我跪下来求她。

en: The market for luxury goods is growing fast.
zh: 奢侈品市场增长得很快。

en: I would like to live in luxury.
zh: 我想过奢侈的生活。

en: With her extravagant tastes, she was incapable of making ends meet.
zh: 她花钱大手大脚，根本没法收支平衡。

en: A bat is not a bird, but a mammal.
zh: 蝙蝠不是鸟，而是哺乳动物。

en: A bat is not a bird any more than a fish is.
zh: 蝙蝠不是鸟，就像鱼也不是鸟一样。

en: A mirage is said to be an illusion.
zh: 海市蜃楼被认为是一种幻觉。

en: It's not good to wake a sleeping snake.
zh: 惊动一条正在睡觉的蛇可不是什么好事。

en: Adversity makes a man wise, not rich.
zh: 逆境让人睿智，而不是富有。

en: Hardship makes the man.
zh: 苦难造就人。

en: I think I have tendonitis.
zh: 我觉得我得了腱鞘炎。

en: I think I have tendinitis.
zh: 我觉得我得了腱鞘炎。

en: I have a rash around my anus.
zh: 我肛门周围长了皮疹。

en: A burnt child dreads the fire.
zh: 被火烫过的孩子怕火。

en: Please see that the birds in the cage get water and food every day.
zh: 请务必每天给笼子里的鸟喂水喂食。

en: Count the apples in the basket.
zh: 数数篮子里的苹果。

en: There's a bird singing in the cage, isn't there?
zh: 笼子里有只鸟在唱歌，对吧？

en: There are birds singing in the cage, aren't there?
zh: 笼子里有些鸟在唱歌，对吧？

en: An eyelid opens wide.
zh: 眼皮睁得大大的。

en: I can't stand reptiles.
zh: 我受不了爬行动物。

en: I hate reptiles.
zh: 我讨厌爬行动物。

en: Soseki was a contemporary of Ohgai.
zh: 漱石和鸥外是同时代的人。

en: I gave him an enema.
zh: 我给他灌了肠。

en: Some animals will not breed when kept in cages.
zh: 有些动物关在笼子里就不繁殖了。

en: The caged tiger lashed its tail.
zh: 笼子里的老虎甩着尾巴。

en: The drought led to an insufficiency of food.
zh: 干旱导致了粮食短缺。

en: The more she spurns my love, the more it grows.
zh: 她越是拒绝我的爱，我的爱就越深。

en: I'm afraid my tonsils are swollen.
zh: 恐怕我的扁桃体肿了。

en: The comet leaves a trail of light behind it as it moves.
zh: 彗星在移动时会留下一道光迹。

en: All you do is string together a bunch of farfetched ideas. I can't understand a word of it.
zh: 你只是把一堆牵强附会的想法拼凑在一起，我一句也听不懂。

en: After being exposed to a large amount of radiation, vomiting and diarrhea will start quickly.
zh: 在遭受大剂量辐射后，很快就会开始呕吐和腹泻。

en: Smell is one of the five senses.
zh: 嗅觉是五感之一。

en: I have a good sense of smell.
zh: 我的嗅觉很灵敏。

en: I can't smell well. I have lost my sense of smell.
zh: 我嗅觉不太灵，闻不到味道。

en: I've lost my sense of smell.
zh: 我失去嗅觉了。

en: My sense of smell is weakening.
zh: 我的嗅觉在退化。

en: I had an asthma attack.
zh: 我哮喘发作了。

en: The watch was not to be found anywhere.
zh: 哪儿也找不到那块表。

en: The collection of wristwatches is a hobby.
zh: 收藏手表是一种爱好。

en: The dog ate a watch and a Japanese fan.
zh: 那只狗吃了一块表和一把日式折扇。

en: I can't find my watch.
zh: 我找不到我的表了。

en: Let go of my arm! I can't stand people touching me.
zh: 放开我的胳膊！我受不了别人碰我。

en: Please let go of my arm. You're hurting me.
zh: 请放开我的胳膊，你弄疼我了。

en: Let go of my arm!
zh: 放开我的胳膊！

en: Would you please let go of my arm?
zh: 能请你放开我的胳膊吗？

en: Please let go of my arm.
zh: 请放开我的胳膊。

en: Let go of my arm.
zh: 放开我的胳膊。

en: Swing your arm back and forth.
zh: 前后甩动你的胳膊。

en: I fractured my arm.
zh: 我胳膊骨折了。

en: I was not aware of a mosquito biting my arm.
zh: 我都没察觉到有蚊子在叮我的胳膊。

en: Stretch your arms straight.
zh: 把胳膊伸直。

en: I'll try my hand at cooking.
zh: 我打算试着下个厨。

en: The wound in the arm left a scar.
zh: 胳膊上的伤口留疤了。

en: The wound left a scar on his arm.
zh: 伤口在他胳膊上留下了疤。

en: The wound left a scar on my arm.
zh: 伤口在我胳膊上留下了疤。

en: The wound left a scar on her arm.
zh: 伤口在她胳膊上留下了疤。

en: A good craftsman takes pride in his work.
zh: 优秀的工匠以自己的作品为傲。

en: I have an ache in my arm.
zh: 我胳膊有点疼。

en: My arm hurts.
zh: 我胳膊疼。

en: How do you feel about the Gulf War?
zh: 你对海湾战争怎么看？

en: What's your opinion of the Gulf War?
zh: 你对海湾战争有什么看法？

en: What do you think about the Gulf War?
zh: 你觉得海湾战争怎么样？

en: Gulf nations are constantly menaced by war.
zh: 海湾国家一直受到战争的威胁。

en: The bay is full of boats and people.
zh: 海湾里到处是船和人。

en: The bay has more yachts than sailboats.
zh: 海湾里的游艇比帆船多。

en: You cannot make bricks without straw.
zh: 巧妇难为无米之炊。

en: You can't make bricks without straw.
zh: 没有稻草是造不出砖的。

en: Bricks can't be made without straw.
zh: 不加稻草就没法做砖。

en: An eagle's wings are more than one meter across.
zh: 老鹰的翅膀展开超过了一米。

en: An eagle was soaring high up in the air.
zh: 一只老鹰在高空盘旋。

en: When the frame is finished, the spider fixes lines of silk across it, just like the spokes of a bicycle wheel.
zh: 框架搭好后，蜘蛛会在上面拉丝，就像自行车的辐条一样。

en: The planets revolve around the sun.
zh: 行星绕着太阳转。

en: Planets move around a fixed star.
zh: 行星绕着恒星转。

en: The surface of a planet is composed mostly of water.
zh: 行星表面大部分都是水。

en: I have a slight pain in my side.
zh: 我侧腹有点疼。

en: Would you mind standing aside?
zh: 能请你让开一下吗？

en: Please step aside.
zh: 请让一下。

en: I perspired under the arms.
zh: 我腋下出汗了。

en: Don't be a backseat driver.
zh: 别在后面瞎指挥。

en: Did you or did you not accept the bribe?
zh: 你到底有没有收受贿赂？

en: Let's change the subject.
zh: 咱们换个话题吧。

en: We talked about a variety of topics.
zh: 我们聊了很多不同的话题。

en: Some people are good talkers and others good listeners.
zh: 有些人擅长表达，而有些人擅长倾听。

en: I want a full report though.
zh: 不过我还是要一份完整的报告。

en: It wasn't until I heard him speak that I recognized him.
zh: 直到听见他说话，我才认出他来。

en: Please continue with your story.
zh: 请继续讲你的故事吧。

en: We enjoy talking.
zh: 我们很喜欢聊天。

en: Will you stop talking?
zh: 你能别说了吗？
